sun.awt.X11.XEmbeddedFrame


Bug 68353 was closed saying SWT_AWT will work on solaris with JDK1.5.

But still i'm getting the above exception...

Please do the needful

Thanks
Ramakrishnan

SWT_AWT will only work with X11Toolkit. The default toolkit on Solaris 1.5.0 
is MToolkit. You need to change the default toolkit. Here is a site that shows 
how you do this.

http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.5.0/docs/guide/awt/1.5/xawt.html
